articles.author: Natalie Rahhal U.S.
articles.title: 36 people developed rare blood disorder after covid vaccination - Daily Mail
articles.description: At least 36 people have developed a rare, life-threatening blood disorder, called thrombocytopenia, after receiving either of the two COVID-19 vaccines authorized in the US.
articles.content:
At least 36 people have developed a rare, life-threatening blood disorder, called thrombocytopenia, after receiving either of the two COVID-19 vaccines authorized in the US.

articles.title: Consulting behemoth McKinsey inks biggest-ever Aussie acquisition - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: It is learnt the New York-headquartered bigwig has snapped up Sydney-based digital consultancy firm Hypothesis.
articles.content:
The Hypothesis acquisition is also a sign that McKinsey is looking to get on the tools a bit more when it comes to digital consulting.
